expression:
jython:import re
result = cells["NOMBRE"].value

result = re.sub('á','a', result)
result = re.sub('é','e', result)
result = re.sub('í','i', result)
result = re.sub('ó','o', result)
result = re.sub('ú','u', result)
result = re.sub('ñ','n', result)
result = re.sub(' ','_', result)
result = result.lower()

return result
